alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued August 20 at 6:53PM PDT until August 21 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Indian Wells Valley, Mojave Desert Slopes and Mojave Desert. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert; Mojave Desert Slopes
